name: The Commander's Room at Hotel Hasingland

reviews.title: A real treat in Haines
reviews.text: The menu is limited, but when the food is this good that's not a problem. Everything we had--salad, bread, entree, dessert, wine--was superb. And the service was attentive and efficient, too. If you're up for a fine dining experience in Haines, this is definitely the place to go.
